title: 2001/126/EC: Council Decision of 12 February 2001 appointing an Italian alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
Council Decision
of 12 February 2001
appointing an Italian alternate member of the Committee of the Regions
(2001/126/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1998(1) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the appointment of Mr Paolo AGOSTINACCIO, former alternate member, as a full member of the Committee of the Regions,
Having regard to the proposal from the Italian Government,
main_body: Mr Luciano DEL FRE is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Paolo AGOSTINACCIO, for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 February 2001.
For the Council
The President
T. Östros
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
